tool.help:
**What it does**
Gets the display URI for the text and HTML outputs of the **MEME** tool in the **CEGR Galaxy ChIP-exo** pipeline. A JSON dictionary containing the run, sample and this URI is sent via a POST to the PEGR REST API where the information is stored to support the CEGR ChIP-exo statistics reports.
